name: Charles Barkley
description: 6'6" power forward, stocky muscular build, MVP, outspoken personality

power-rebound.name: Power Rebound
power-rebound.description: Ripping down a rebound with elbows out, clearing space
power-rebound.prompt: grabbing rebound with both hands above head - elbows out wide clearing space, stocky powerful body coiled, feet spread for balance, fierce expression, muscles tensed, about to outlet pass

coast-to-coast.name: Coast to Coast
coast-to-coast.prompt: sprinting full speed dribbling with one hand - stocky body low to ground, powerful legs churning, eyes on basket, defender trailing hopelessly, about to rise for powerful dunk

turnaround-jumper.name: Turnaround Jumper
turnaround-jumper.prompt: executing turnaround jumper from post - back to defender, rotating on pivot foot, releasing high-arcing shot, perfect form despite stocky build, confident smirk

celebration.name: Celebration
celebration.prompt: pumping fist in celebration - mouth open in victory yell, stocky frame animated with joy, pointing at crowd, pure competitive satisfaction
